transcript:
Customer: Raghunandan Raghav
Hello.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Haan namaskar Lokesh ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji haan sir, aap se promotion ke regarding connect kiya tha. To jaanna chah raha tha sir service ko lekar ke to kaise chali sir service IndiaMART ki buyleads ko lekar ke thoda bataiye.
Customer: Abhi to suddenly ekdam down kabhi achanak down ho jati hai kabhi up ho jati hai pata nahi kya karte hain.
Customer: Kabhi bhi lagta badhti hai kabhi ghat jati hai kabhi kuch samajh mein nahi aata.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Testing mode pe karte hain kya karte hain wo log pata nahi.
Executive: Achcha to matlab jaise matlab inquiry inquiries to sir aa rahi hai inquiry to jyada hi ho kar ke ye.
Customer: Aa rahi hai but lekin jaise abhi beech mein kafi footfall badha tha na iske upar mein apne catalog ke upar mein.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Suddenly wo down ho jata hai jaise wahi cheez samajh mein nahi aati ki aisa kyun hota hai.
Executive: Suddenly down ho jata hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi jaise abhi inquiries vagaira kam ho gayi hai bahut jyada matlab nahi aa rahi hai kya.
Customer: Haan abhi currently wahi matlab jaise kya hota hai beech mein jab ek bar aap se baat hui thi to us samay thoda sa bhai footfall aane se matlab kya hota hai catalog view vagaira badhne lag jata hai.
Executive: Badh badh jata hai sahi baat hai.
Customer: Haan aur jaise yadi footfall kam hone se already apne aap catalog view kam ho jata hai.
Executive: Sahi hai kam ho jata hai matlab inquiry aap bata rahe ho inquiry jab jyada ho jati hai to ek tarike se matlab catalog view bhi badh jata hai.
Customer: Payment ke hisab se.
Executive: Badhega hi obviously baat sahi hai.
Executive: To abhi abhi jaise jo needs vagaira jo aa rahi hai pichhla ek week ki baat kare pichhle ek ded week ki to down ho gaya hai abhi dekhiyega aap agar.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Aur iske pehle beech mein thoda theek chal raha tha haan pata nahi fir ye to kuch waha par se karte hain setting waiting kya karte hain pata nahi mere ko.
Executive: Inquiry to buyleads bhi dekh raha hu sir ek minute.
Executive: Ek week mein matlab 10 buyleads to consume hua hai inquiry bhi aaya hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi inquiry vagaira sab aa raha hai matlab main aapko wahi cheez matlab point kar raha hu ki jo footfall aa raha hai wo sir haan.
Customer: Jaise kuch promotion ka koi kuch isme kam kar dete hain jyada karte hain kya karte hain.
Executive: Hmm ye cheez.
Executive: Rizo duplicator wedding card ka.
Customer: Achcha wedding card printing machine ki jyada aayi hongi aapke pass Rizo digital duplicator ki thodi kam aayi hongi aisa hai kya.
Customer: Haan wedding card ki thodi jyada aayi thi beech mein usi ka footfall matlab jaise jyada lag raha tha samajh mein aisa aa raha tha.
Executive: Hmm aur Rizo digital duplicator ki thodi kam ho gayi hogi aur digital duplicator ki bhi thodi kam hui hai haan kam hui hai sir kyunki matlab.
Customer: Bhi hua hai aur wedding card ka to jyada hai Rizo ka kam hua hai thoda aur digital duplicator ka bhi kam hua hai. Hum log frequent nazar rakhe rahte hain na.
Executive: Hmm nahi hua hai sir hua hai main jaise aapko batau na Rizo digital duplicator ki IndiaMART pe approved buyleads ki baat batau to jaise pichhle mahine 373 thi aur November mein 255 ho gayi wedding card ki 269 thi 349 ho gayi aur digital duplicator ki 198 thi aur 153 ho gayi to is tarah se duplicator wala hai na usme thoda sa kam hua hai ye next month mein sir recover kar jayega.
Customer: Haan nahi ho jayega lekin jaise matlab ye to kuch waha par wo karte hain kya matlab.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir ye pata hai IndiaMART pe approve hi kam hui hai IndiaMART pe approve hi kam hui hai agar aap dekhiye agar agar approve agar man lijiye pichhle mahine ke barabar ki agar is mahine bhi barabar ho jati in case agar man lijiye to main ye keh sakta hu ki haan thoda ek tarike se hmm ho sakta hai hamare end se kuch kam raha ho ya aisa kuch raha ho lekin agar koi cheez develop generate hi kam hui hai jyada nahi 19 ka 19 20 ka hi fark hai jyada nahi hai lekin hai wo to sir aapko dikhega hi na jab aap itne actively aap baithoge platform pe to thoda bahut thoda sa bhi difference aayega na to bhi aapko feel hoga.
Customer: Haan actually wahi cheez hai.
Customer: Thoda sa matlab business mein samay dete hain thoda samay to aata hai actually.
Executive: Feel ho jata hai sir thoda sa thoda sa bhi difference hoga na.
Customer: Aur wo jo baki ground work jo staff rahte hain to unko utna nahi samajh mein aati sab cheeze hai na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Kyunki ab aap dekhiye na matlab 2 2000 3 3000 2 2000 2 2500 ki agar buyleads consumption hai to seedhi seedhi baat hai ki next level of ek tarah se active reh kar ke aap check kar rahe ho sari cheezon ko to halka halka bhi movement hoga na sir wo feel hoga wo hua bhi hai isliye maine aapko bata bhi diya.
Customer: Hmm haan koi dikkat nahi hai sir wo koi wo koi dikkat nahi hai wo next month mein recover kar jayega wo next month sabka recover kar jayega next month mein aa jayega ek bar wo unse baat ho rahi thi aapke jo purane ye the na kya naam unka Digvijay Singh ji the sir.
Customer: Hmm to unse ek bar baat hui thi jaise aapke yaha se wo popular product wala chalate hain Google ke upar mein.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To main bola ki paid system wala kuch ye popular product ko chalane ka kya kabhi chalate hain kabhi band kar dete hain aisa bhi chalta hai wo.
Executive: Paid kya Google Google promotion wala.
Customer: Haan Google promotion se bolne se matlab Google mein jo popular product kar ke ek aata hai aaj kal jab search varch karoge na koi cheez ko aap usme photo ke sath mein wo pura wo aata hai matlab uska kai sare buyer seller log ka aata hai na usme popular products mein.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Agar aapne dekha hoga kabhi to usme haan haan sir upar upar upar aata hai suggestion mein aata hai.
Customer: Haan to wo popular product mein jaise sponsored bhi chalta hai actually usme aapke IndiaMART bhi sponsored chala rahi thi beech mein.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To wahi main actually jaan raha main bola ki bhai isme matlab aap main unse bhi bola tha main bola ki paid system wala bhi kuch hai kya to bole abhi to nahi hai aisa kuch aayega to batayenge aisa isliye main matlab puchu jara aap se.
Executive: Uske baad nahi nahi sir abhi aisa haan abhi aisa aisa to nahi hai abhi to aisa kuch nahi ki paid service.
Customer: Hmm main to sir wahi usi ke liye main kaha ek bar sir se baat karunga main service ko lekar ke baat ho jayegi baki sir wo aap se kaha tha thoda ek bar ek bar isko plan kariye na sir wedding card printing wale ko.
Executive: Hmm plan karta hu ye thoda budget ka bhi thoda sa abhi dheere dheere kar ke thoda set down ho raha ho to us samay main bata raha hu wo kar diya kaise bhi kar ke wo to renewal karna hi tha bahut tight position thi tab se bhi maine kiya usko renewal wala kam ko lekin abhi isko karenge thoda sa aur smooth ho jaye thoda karte hain isko kya ab dedh 2 lakh ka kam hai.
Customer: Mera bas wo tha sir ki jaise main ye main ye thodi na keh raha hu sir pura amount karna hai ab agar hum isko part payment mein agar hum baat denge to tab to are to do hi teen mahine ka to rehta hai aur kya hai.
Executive: Abhi sir pad jata hai jahan aap puri payment kar rahe ho waha pe aap half payment karoge khali baki wo rahega lekin main ye nahi keh raha wo bhi to karna hi hai seedhi si baat hai but ye hai ki sir thoda aasan pad jata cheezon ko lekar ke ki bhai chalo aadha aadha kar ke wo bat jayega.
Customer: To isko sir baat ye tha isko abhi agar kara loge to sahi rahega abhi baad baad mein karaenge na to fir wo season season wali baat hai sir aap bhi jante ho hai na abhi jo wedding card printing wale pe jo jyada matlab ek tarike se jo bahut jyada focus hai logon ka jo isme deal kar rahe hain.
Executive: Theek hai main dekhta hu 2 lakh rupaye kariban ka bataye the mere ko to something main pata nahi ek minute ruko preferred leader bataya tha na aapko ek minute leader ka hi bataya tha do 280 280 plus GST ka kuch bataya tha wedding card 280 plus GST ka ek saal ka haan ek saal ka hmm 280 plus theek hai sir main chahta hu isme isme kuch achcha kara dunga sir are theek hai wo to karaoge matlab dhai tak to kam se kam jayega hi man chalo aa jayega dhai tak to le hi jaoge aur fir usme cashback bhi to dilwaunga cashback bhi dilwaunga to pichhla wala cashback ka mera kya hua jo payment payment kiye the apan logon ne pichhla wala cashback ek second abhi check karta hu wo bhi utilize ho gaya hoga pakka aapke cashback utilize kiye nahi hai ek second rukiye cashback ek second rukiye cashback cashback aap log to bol rahe the milega kar do payment aisa cashback ka to hua to tha shayad baat cashback sir abhi hum log ye baat kar rahe the na sir abhi jo service hai iske point of view mein baat kar rahe the ki aap abhi ye wala jo purane wale mein ye baat kiye the na hum log us time pe jab hum wedding card ka discussion kar rahe the na to hum log ye baat kar rahe the ki sir isko kara do jo part payment hai isko complete kara do aur iska payment kar doge to cashback aur dilwa dunga ye baat hui thi achcha purane payment mein matlab kuch bhi milega sir usme kuch nahi tha lekin haan is wale mein abhi hai abhi jaise agar aap matlab payment karoge na jaise man lijiye part payment mein bhi jo hum payment karoge man lo ek ke aas pass ka kuch to banega hi ek ke ek jo bhi agar payment karega to usko 10% ka cashback allot kar rahe hain hum log to cashback se ye fayda rehta hai sir ki aage chal ke jaise man lo koi bhi service ka renewal aata hai ya koi nayi service aap soch rahe hote ho to usme hum adjust kar lete hain wo fayda ho jata hai sir hai na wahi to mere khyal se maximizer ka mera aayega lagta hai maximizer ek minute bata hi deta hu main aapko February mein aayega to abhi jaise man lo abhi aap kara loge na to February mein wo maximizer ke through hum log usko kar le jayenge fayda ho jayega fayda ho jayega sir baat karta hu chalo theek hai phone kai bar aa liya lekin main busy itna chal raha abhi to baat hi nahi ho pa rahi thi nahi main samajh raha hu sir to dekho mera to kam hai sir dekho main to puchunga hi aap se ek nahi 10 bar puchunga nahi jahan sir dekho jahan fayda dikhega sir waha to dekho seedhi si baat hai main bhi chahunga ki client ka fayda ho us cheez ko lekar ke theek hai chalo fir main baat karta hu unse hai na ek bar aap baat kariye aapko sir share karu proforma proforma bana ke share karu nahi nahi nahi proforma wo forma mat bhejo fir aapko hi dabav ho jata hai na ki proforma bheje ho kya ho aisa kuch dabav dabav kuch nahi dabav wabav kuch nahi aapko ek bar part payment bana kar ke bhejta hu na aap dekho to sahi pata to lagega ki bhai kaise karna hai kya karna hai na hmm theek hai theek hai sir theek hai bhejta hu okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries and footfall suddenly decreasing.

- Catalog views decreasing.

- Enquired about paid system for popular products.

- Enquired about previous cashback.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that IndiaMART approved leads decreased.

- Executive informed about 10% cashback on part payment.

- Executive offered to send a part payment plan.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a part payment plan.



Alert (If Any):

cashback

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog view, footfall, cashback, payment
